"fermilab-pub-06-327-e" "arXiv eprint number hep-ex/0609014" Phys.Rev.D74:092001,2006 74 ISSN 0556-2821; PRVDAQ AC Abbott, B.; Abolins, M.; Acharya, B.S.; Adams, M.; Aguilo, E.; Ahsan, M.; Abazov, V.M.; Adams, T.; Alexeev, G.D.; Agelou, M.; Ahn, S.H. Free-to-read Unrestricted online access star The authors measure the dimuon charge asymmetry A in p{bar p} collisions at a center of mass energy √s 1960 GeV. The data was recorded with the D0 detector and corresponds to an integrated luminosity of approximately 1.0 fb⁻¹. Assuming that the asymmetry A is due to asymmetric B° ↔ {bar B}° mixing and decay, they extract the CP-violation parameter of B° mixing and decay: R(ε{sub B°}/1) +  AC02-07CH11359 Physics Of Elementary Particles And Fields. edbsc A Centers. general_note_ssm: Abbott, B.; Abolins, M.; Acharya, B.S.; Adams, M.; Aguilo, E.; Ahsan, M.; Abazov, V.M.; Adams, T.; Alexeev, G.D.; Agelou, M.; Ahn, S.H.
notes_summary_ssim: The authors measure the dimuon charge asymmetry A in p{bar p} collisions at a center of mass energy √s 1960 GeV. The data was recorded with the D0 detector and corresponds to an integrated luminosity of approximately 1.0 fb⁻¹. Assuming that the asymmetry A is due to asymmetric B° ↔ {bar B}° mixing and decay, they extract the CP-violation parameter of B° mixing and decay: R(ε{sub B°}/1) +
